sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-button v-b-toggle.collapse-2 variant="success m-2">建立得獎資料</b-button>
    <b-collapse id="collapse-2" class="m-2">
        <b-card>
            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">得獎名稱</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input v-model="editdata.title" placeholder="請填入得獎名稱"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">詳細內文</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-textarea
                            id="textarea"
                            v-model="editdata.content"
                            placeholder="請填入詳細內文"
                            rows="5"
                            max-rows="5"
                            >
                        </b-form-textarea>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="1">
                        <label for="">排名</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="3">
                        <b-form-input v-model="editdata.ranking" placeholder="請填入得獎名次"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="1">
                        <label for="">排名樣式</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="3">
                        <b-form-select v-model="editdata.ranking_style" :options="options.ranking_styles"></b-form-select>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="1">
                        <label for="">得獎科系</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="3">
                        <b-form-select v-model="editdata.department" :options="options.departments"></b-form-select>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>

                <b-col md="12 text-center">
                    <b-button variant="success m-2" @click="createData">創建</b-button>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
        </b-card>
    </b-collapse>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
    name: 'App',
    data(){
        return {
            options: {
                departments: [
                    { value: 41, text: '應用英文系' },
                    { value: 42, text: '應用日文系' },
                    { value: 43, text: '應用中文系' },
                ],
                ranking_styles: [
                    { value: 0, text: '預設樣式' },
                    { value: 1, text: '第一名(金牌)' },
                    { value: 2, text: '第二名(銀牌)' },
                    { value: 3, text: '第三名(銅牌)' },
                ]
            },
            editdata: {
                title: "",
                content: "",
                ranking: "",
                ranking_style: 0,
                department: 41,
            }
        }
    },
    created(){
    },
    methods: 
    {
        createData(){
            // Banner資料建立
            axios({
                method: 'post',
                url: 'http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/public/api/honor/create',
                dataType: 'json',
                data: {
                    title: this.editdata.title,
                    content: this.editdata.content,
                    ranking: this.editdata.ranking,
                    ranking_style: this.editdata.ranking_style,
                    department: this.editdata.department
                },
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json",
                    "Accept": "application/json",
                    "Authorization": 'Bearer ' + localStorage.getItem('API_TOKEN'),
                }
            })
            .then(() => {
                // console.log(response);
            })
            .catch( (error) => {
                console.log(Promise.reject(error));
            });
        }
    }
}
</script>
